title: All Business Ain't Good Business
itunes:title: All Business Ain't Good Business
description:
On the first day of black history month we opened up the phone lines to see what out listeners thought about the Wendy Williams Lifetime movie, and we also had listeners call up to give their opinion on supporting black businesses. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the Rochchester police for pepper spraying a 9 year old girl.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On the first day of black history month we opened up the phone lines to see what out listeners thought about the Wendy Williams Lifetime movie, and we also had listeners call up to give their opinion on supporting black businesses. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the Rochchester police for pepper spraying a 9 year old girl.
